CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Language__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Tone_of_Email__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Formatting__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Flow__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Options__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Product_Knowledge__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Pricing__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Recommendations__c )),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Email_Quoting_Urgency_and_Closing__c )),0,1)
CustomField.label: Email / Quoting Effectiveness Fields
